attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jonathan Ross has been unfairly suspended for the next three months because of things he and Russle Brand said while Jonathan was a GUEST on Brands show, the show was pre-recorded 2 days before it was aired, this program was fully approved before being aired, both have apologised and this has been accepted and yet Jonathan Ross a brillient broadcaster who has now lost all his shows.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
